title: Heer (Dr. Osvaldo)
body: Swiss botanist and paleontologist, who was in Madeira from the winter of 1850 to the spring of 1851. Works: Remarques sur la manière de végéter des arbres de l'Europe et des Etats Unis transportés à Madère (Bot. Zeitung 1853); Ueber die fossilen Pflanzen von St. George in Madeira (Zurich, 1855); and Der Renton-Garten in Funchal (Gartenflora Deutschlands und der Schweiz). He died in Lausanne in 1883.

Madeira: Location where Dr. Osvaldo Heer worked as a botanist and paleontologist

1850: Start of Dr. Osvaldo Heer's stay in Madeira
1851: End of Dr. Osvaldo Heer's stay in Madeira
1853: Publication of Remarques sur la manière de végéter des arbres de l'Europe et des Etats Unis transportés à Madère
1855: Publication of Ueber die fossilen Pflanzen von St. George in Madeira
